comment: Satellite Imagery - EOGeoDataLayer adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.SatelliteImagery/master/EOGeoDataLayer/schema.json
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic EOGeoDataLayer made for the Satellite Imagerry domain. This entity is primarily associated with the output data layers related to Earth Observation Analysis applications.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: geoMetadata
contents.comment: A text string used to declare the metadata file if available

contents.name: isOutputOf
contents.comment: The ID of the analysis that was performed to extract this data layer

contents.name: localServerPath
contents.comment: A mandatory text string used to declare the path that the output data layer is saved on the server

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: contentInformation
contents.comment: An array that describes for each layer (e.g. band1) or entity name, the type of information (e.g. categorical, numerical) and an array with the explanation of the depicted values (e.g. [1:oil, 0:no oil])

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
